name: GPT Audio Mini (2025-10-06)
description: GPT Audio Mini (gpt-realtime-mini) snapshot released October 6, 2025. A cost-optimized speech-to-speech model that's smaller, quicker, and more budget-friendly than the full GPT Audio model, while maintaining strong audio capabilities.
notes: Released October 6, 2025. Cost-effective alternative providing 75% cost savings compared to GPT Audio. Native speech-to-speech processing without cascaded pipelines. Ideal for high-volume applications requiring frequent audio interactions. Supports real-time audio streaming and multi-turn conversations with natural, expressive responses.
